attributes.action: Institgate an Independent  Investigation with Public Oversight of actions by Tony Blair that constitute War Crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the overwhelming evidence that Tony Blair, as Prime Minister did commit malfeasance, falsify evidence and committed a war crime by joining the US in an illegal war against Iraq; that he did knowingly allow rendition flights to use British facilities throughout the world and UK; that he did knowingly lie to the Nation and put British Troops in harms way in an illegal war and has placed the safety of British people at risk from terrorism as a result of his actions. We do further call for the evidence to be submitted to the International Criminal Court for prosecution.

rejection.details: Tbe PM can not order the police to investigate something. That is a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
